item.title: VMware HealthAnalyzer 3.0 available
item.description: VMware HealthAnalyzer automates the collection of VMware Infrastructure or VMware vSphereâ„¢ inventory, configuration and utilization data, analyzes data and recommends grades, and generates a report card that presents observations, findings and data categorized by VMware Health Check best practices. HealthAnalyzer can be used by VMware consultants and VMware Solution Providers to improve efficiency and accelerate the delivery of a services engagement such as the VMware Health Check.
